title: Wall Street Breakfast September 14: Railroad Worker Strike Is Starting To Rattle Commodity Markets
author: Seeking Alpha

description: Railroad worker strike is starting to rattle commodity markets. Amazon adds new driver benefits, hikes pay amid union challenge. U.S. federal budget deficit expands to $220B in August.
